subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Starting at 1 p.m. in New York, four of the N.B.A.’s top teams will play two games, over 10 hours, in two boroughs, about six miles apart.
snippet: Starting at 1 p.m. in New York, four of the N.B.A.’s top teams will play two games, over 10 hours, in two boroughs, about six miles apart.
